about_the_game:
Recently, 25 years before the Hero appeared, the King of the Dark Elves made a deal with the Mermaid Queen, promising to protect her kingdom from the attacks of various creatures that inhabit the depths of the Dark Sea.

Everything was fine until the insidious Serpent-Haired Medusa attacked Aquantis, determined to recapture her lost territories. The king of the dark elves was obliged to help, but it never happened....

Something prevented him from hearing the call of the mermaids, who sang desperately, hoping to save their queen. But the mistress of the sea was dead. Her young daughter, who took over the throne after Medusa's attack, makes a deal with a well-known syndicate in Pentarull. The young queen is eager to take revenge on the dark elves for a broken promise that cost her dearly.

While this world is suffering from the Demon Queen's atrocities, another war threatens the fragile Pentarull...

Features of The Dark Sea DLC:

🌊 THERE ARE 2 NEW UNIQUE NEW REGIONS!
🌊 A challenging story with some tough decisions that you have to make...
🌊 Some new monster girls, and each has her own moral
🌊 Exclusive H-scenes, erotic cards and puzzles
🌊 New side quests, that reveal the plot of the main game and other DLCs
🌊 New battle cards and equipment
🌊 New soundtrack in elven and marine style
🌊 New achievements on Steam
🌊 Unique desktop wallpapers
🔝 THIS DLC IS BIGGER THAN THE REVENGE OF THE FOX SPIRIT DLC

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are adults (18+)
The game contains adult content including nudity and sex scenes, swearing and smoking scenes.

The game features nude girls, monster girls and animated porno scenes with them, also erotic cards and puzzles.

short_description: Long ago, the elves of the Dark Forest promised to protect the sea kingdom of Aquantis from the depth's evil creatures. Though, a war with the Demon Queen prevented them from doing so. And many inhabitants of Pentarull know how vengeful the depth's creatures can be...
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Polish, German, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Bulgarian
